name: Just Bounce!
description:
Just Bounce! It's that simple! Bounce the ball on the ground when they're the same colour.

How to play: Press the screen once to shoot the ball downwards. Press it once more to stop the ball midway.

What to do: Get the highest score possible by matching colours!

What NOT to do:

  • Don't match green or blue with each other. That takes away one point.
  • Don't match red with any colour other than itself. That's game over!

Special thanks to Alex Strook for the Skybox Shader.

If you enjoy the game, consider downloading it for your phone! APK's right below.
